Text: I forgot to mention at the description, but the embeded version is 5.0.2-1031769. If you want to use it with some other version you can skip the download of the file at the Update folder and put the other version installer there instead.

By the way, it is possible that VMware Player Portable will crash if VMware Player is currently installed on the machine.
Please uninstall any installed VMware Player before using this!!
Also, if you want to use multiple versions of this portable app, never use them simultaneously, and always clean one before using the other.
